content.rendered:
When it comes to getting great deals on products just in time for Christmas, then Black Friday is a great time to start, especially with our Vodafone Black Friday deals. This year November 26th is the date to mark on your calendars as we take a look at some of the best deals you will see on Vodafone handsets.

Do Your Research

When it comes to getting the best deal, you want to start your research sooner rather than later. There is a huge range of different handsets on the market. With the growth of the Vodafone 5G network then this is only going to increase the number of new devices hitting the market. So, you want to make sure you know exactly what phone it is that you are going to be aiming for.

To 5G or Not to 5G?

5G has grown massively in the last year. It hasn’t reached everywhere yet, but it will do.  Given that all networks have been upgraded to 5G, you might decide that now is the right time to upgrade to 5G.

Handsets to Watch For

When it comes to picking your handset there are some fantastic models out there to choose from that are all likely to see deals on Black Friday. The iPhone 13 is a stunning piece of kit from Apple and their best phone on the market currently. If you are an Apple fan, then this is the mobile you should go to. Apple doesn’t often offer discounts on their kit, but Black Friday is normally an exception. Vodafone are known for their market leading Black Friday phone deals so you\’re going to want to keep an eye out for this one.

Other Rising Stars

 The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip line is another flagship phone to hit 2021 and what’s not to love about the new Google Pixel 6 5G device. 

Year-Round Deals

When it comes to finding the best deals on Vodafone mobiles, then we always aim to deliver, not just on Black Friday. We have some of the best deals on handsets and Vodafone network bundles available all year round. So, get ahead of the game and take a look at what we can do for you now.

Our Black Friday deals are live right now! and we have decided to launch early so you can avoid the rush and reduce stress. New deals available on our Black Friday Phone Deals page –  discover more now.
